data.title: Sen~ora Arcadia De Stearns Baker
data.meta_description: Her father was Don Juan Lorenzo Bruno Bandini and her mother Don~a Dolores Estudillo. She married Don Abel Stearns at San Gabriel Mission when she was about sixteen, and, some time after this death in 1871, she married Col. R. S. Baker.Portrait of Sen~ora Arcadia De Stearns Baker, born in San Diego during the 1820s.
